.. _examples:

========
Examples
========

This page contains a collection of examples that show how Coiled can be used in
a variety of situations.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:

   Prefect for workflow automation<example-prefect>
   Optuna<example-optuna>

.. list-table::
   :widths: 50 50
   :header-rows: 0

   * - Coiled quickstart
     - |quickstart|
   * - Scaling XGBoost with Dask and Coiled
     - |scaling xgboost|
   * - :doc:`Prefect for Workflow Automation <example-prefect>`
     - 
   * - Analyzing data with Dask-SQL
     - |dask-sql|
   * - Coiled & JupyterLab
     - |jupyterlab|
   * - :doc:`Hyperparameter optimization with Optuna and Dask <example-optuna>`
     - |optuna|
